locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Fantastic and friendly customer service. The staff was warm and welcoming. It was my first time using the shower facilities while traveling and they were very clean!
The shower rooms have plenty of space, the worker's are very polite, this is the best Pilot I've been to.

For first time in one year we have the pleasto visit a very good care and clean Pilot. The shower was very clean good maintained (except for the trash can that was with some early trash). Good customer service. Good job manager and team.

‚Ä¶ . Clean restrooms with lots of privacy, well stocked with soap and that scrubby stuff to remove oil and grease from your hands. It also appears that they have laundry and possibly shower facilities. Food options including a Subway. Thanks ‚Ä¶

Friendly, nice employees, no complaints whatsoever. Nice decent shower. Clean restrooms, plenty of food options. If there's not enough parking, there is a Walmart right down the road that I personally gave 5 stars.

Today, my father was at this Pilot center during the day in line to get a shower ticket. He was second in line and the man in front of him was having a credit card issue and spent about ten minutes trying to get it fixed, talking to the ‚Ä¶
Great shower's good food for what it's worth
Nice place to stop for us trucker's, fuel,shower and something to eat. And the cashier Tim was very good to us üòäüòä ‚Ä¶
Was able to come to this place late at night to do laundry, take a shower and get fuel for my truck. Friendly staff.
The shower heads need to be taller.  At 6'5" i shouldn't be eye level with it when the ceiling is 2ft taller.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ people if you black American or any other black or people of color please avoid this place don‚Äôt take gas don‚Äôt ask shower even ignore the food because what I hear people and what I see was same please be aware of the situation of ‚Ä¶
I can believe people smile that wide if you pay them $13/hour. You call it GREAT PAY?! How dare are you Love‚Äôs?! Now I feel guilty when use shower. ‚Ä¶

This is a very clean place and I recommend using the place if you need a quick shower as well. The showers are clean and private and well taken care of. I had to use the showers out there temporarily while the contractors had my bathroom ‚Ä¶

This is the best Love‚Äôs I‚Äôve been to in a long time!!! Clean, super friendly staff, 3 towels in the shower, plus it was super clean. Just amazed with the overall experience at this location today 06/30/19 around 10:30 am. Just a great group ‚Ä¶

This store didn't have any men working so they have to close the men's room for the courtesy check. The assistant manager Sara let the line up of men use the shower rooms. Amazing!! Thank you Sara my husband appreciated it very much!

‚Ä¶ very friendly staff and everything is well stocked. And they have showers and whatever for truckers because I always hear them call out on the PA when the truckers bathroom shower is ready. I highly recommend this truck stop you will not ‚Ä¶

This location does not care about drivers. Just got denied a shower because no physical card. Who cares you get paid by corporate so long as showers are on account.  Nice way to treat someone who sacrificed home time for you.

One of the Love's Travel Stops I stop at least once a month. Good area, clean restrooms and shower. They have everything you would need for a Truck stop. There is KFC opposite this stop, on other side of the road.

If a Driver need to take shower üöø stay a way from that place they never have shower Today 2/04/2024 is my 3rd times in less than a month I visit this loves to fill up and take shower üöø but shower always out of order worst place to come toüò°üò° ‚Ä¶
Shower was missing wash cloth and floor mat. Made do with what was there. Clean but when informed about the problem it fell on deaf ears. Typical driver treatment.

locations.title: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop
locations.content: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be

showerReviews.reviewText: Very nice place! The staff is friendly and polite ‚Äî it creates a welcoming atmosphere right away. The restrooms are clean and well-maintained, which is also important. Thank you for the comfort!

It's a Truck Stop designed for Truckers. It fits. This Pilot is one of the cleanest I've seen. I dislike that cars are going on the Truck fuel island to use the air lines. This is for semis, not cars. We have to put up with that crap enough ‚Ä¶

Workers just standing around. Meanwhile the toilets are full of you know what and unusable. Also you‚Äôll be happy to know they have 4 working dryers! As if it matters tho cause they only have one worker washer. Meanwhile the machines they use all work just fine. Typical
Very nice, prices are good. Nice! Clean showers & bathrooms. Easy in & Easy out!!

Nice clean place to stop and take a break.

That being said, IF you have a travel trailer of any decent size maneuvering in ‚Ä¶
Fantastic and friendly customer service. The staff was warm and welcoming. It was my first time using the shower facilities while traveling and they were very clean!
